snippet.title: WIP  | Aug. 2022  | Road to Vostok
snippet.description:
Road to Vostok WIP is a series of short behind-the-scenes videos that show what has happened in the game's development over the past month. 

Road to Vostok is a hardcore single-player survival game set in a post-apocalyptic border zone between Finland and Russia.

____________________

SUPPORT THE PROJECT ON PATREON
https://www.patreon.com/roadtovostok

____________________

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1963610/Road_to_Vostok/

____________________

PREVIOUS DEVLOG EPISODE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AmiENomel4o

____________________

FOLLOW THE DEVELOPMENT
Website: https://roadtovostok.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/roadtovostok
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/roadtovostok/
Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/roadtovostok

____________________

DEVELOPED BY USING
Unity (Game Engine) https://unity.com/
Blender (3D-modelling) https://www.blender.org/
OBS (Screen capture) https://obsproject.com/

____________________

MUSIC
Tomas Herudek - East Crew (License from Artlist)
https://artlist.io/song/58285/east-crew

Yehezkel Raz - Nightfall Hymn (License from Artlist)
https://artlist.io/song/32454/nightfall-hymn

____________________
